name: Atlanta Air Academy
about: Atlanta Air Academy, founded in 2015 by the owners and pilots of Atlanta Air Charter in Kennesaw, GA, is dedicated to training, mentoring, and providing a pathway for well-trained pilots in the airline and charter industry. Driven by a passion for aviation and a commitment to safety, the academy is led by a group of experienced airline and military pilots. Atlanta Air Academy offers comprehensive flight training programs, utilizing a fleet of well-maintained Cessna 172s and other advanced aircraft. The academy is integrated with Atlanta Air Charter, which operates a fleet of King Air 200 aircraft, providing students with real-world experience and career opportunities. With a focus on excellence and professional standards, Atlanta Air Academy is poised to meet the growing demand for qualified pilots and guide aspiring aviators toward fulfilling careers in aviation.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Intro Flight
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Private Pilot
Instrument"]
